HPV在男性中比女性更常见，并且与癌症率上升有关虽然人类乳头瘤病毒（HPV）与宫颈癌风险和妇女最相关，但由俄亥俄州立大学综合癌症中心委托的一项新调查 - 亚瑟·G·詹姆斯癌症医院和理查德·J·索洛夫研究所（OSUCCC - 詹姆斯）表明，大多数人在男性中实际上没有女性比女性更常见的是与男性相关联，而与男性相关联，这是cancers cancers cancers cancers cancers的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/hpv-more-common-in-men-than-men-than-women-and-women-and-link-link- cancer-cancer-cancer-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/hpv-more-common-in-men-than-than-than-women-and-women-and-link-linc-to-cancer-cancer-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2cf10fb7-cbe9-4779-b6f7-52580429d9fd Tue, 04 Mar 2025 20:20:13 -0500 HPV more common in men than women and linked to rising cancer rates

自身免疫性疾病的误诊会导致长期患者影响研究人员发现，临床医生和患者之间经常经历“误解和沟通不畅的鸿沟”，导致自身免疫性疾病（如狼疮和血管炎）被错误诊断为精神病或精神病患者，对患者产生了深远而持久的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/misdiagnosis-of-autoimmune-diseases-leads-leads-to-long-term-term-patient-impact.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/misdiagnosis-of-autoimmune-diseases-leads-leads-to-long-term-term-patient-patient-impact.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9053b02d-89EA-414D-9585-B18B18B00D9CAF5 Tue, 04 Mar 2025 20:08:10 -0500 Misdiagnosis of autoimmune diseases leads to long-term patient impact
